name: Dev Starter kit (Mini)
description:
DEMO

ORIGINAL STORE

made with construct 2

Starter kit template for developer to helping build the game.

This template include:

  • Advanced Admob & Cocoon
  • Remove ads
  • Buy item & convert coin (Anti Cheat)
  • Buy item & convert coin
  • Leaderboard (online)
  • Demo-chat
  • Tap Battle DEMO
  • Splash Screen (Basic) v1
  • Splash Screen (Basic) v2
  • Splash Screen First Layout
  • Splash Screen Next Layout
  • Appearance Text Box
  • Orientation
  • Particle effect
  • Set position by viewport
  • Sound setting

The project uses 3rd party addons:

  • Plugin 'Cocoon Ads' by Ludei
  • Plugin 'Advanced Text box' by Pinco
  • Plugin 'photon'
  • Plugin 'photon-chat'

*** Addons installation ***

  • Place plugin folder into '<install path>\exporters\html5\plugins'

*** NOTE ***

  • Full support is available for this item.
